CONVERSATION GROUP: BK: Decided to leave the mentions of Middledark in this conversation while changing most to Underdark -- gives this one flavor (This task was a WOTC request 5/13/2015)
Y-you there! I seem to be stuck in a predicament...could you do a favor for this poor fool?
So that's a funny question! Or well, this is a funny situation. Or...this is all terrible.
Name's Fletcher. I'm of the Divination School of Magic! I've always loved figuring out the hidden gems of this world, and its secrets...pulling back the curtain, if you would.
So what better place to explore than the Middledark!? It's wonderful down here! Aside from all of the chaotic demons around, I'm having the time of my life!
[SUCCESS] W-whoa! Alright, I get it! Put those strong fists of yours down!
The secrets these walls hold is immense! Who built these portals? What kind of magic controls it? I need to answer these questions!
I came down to the Middledark to find if the great Diviner Gromph Baenre left anything behind...sure, he was incredibly dangerous, but...
I'm familiar with the Divination school. What have you discovered while down here? Namely, the portals?
So as I was studying this portal, I must've spent too much time inside it! I can't get out now! But I have a way out! I swear!
I need you to find the other portal where my...other half is. I'll kick around as hard as I can so you can see it clearly!
I have my spellbook back there. If you can retrieve it for me and return it here, I can get myself out. Probably just need to figure out how this one specific portal works...
Pull me out!? Oh no, I'm afraid that's impossible. Whatever magic is keeping me stuck...it's doing a good job!
[FAILURE] [As you pull Fletcher, he doesn't budge, no matter your strength. There's no way he's budging.]
Oww!! I swear I felt something pop just now...
We got the spellbook right here.
Thank you so much again for getting me out of that mess! But boy, do I really need to get some new robes...oh, bother...
e quest hasn't started yet, and they found fletcher's butt first, and picked up the spellbook
